scripts.lint:structured-logs: grep -r 'console\.' src/ | grep -v '\[.*\]\[.*\]' || echo 'All logs are structured'
scripts.test:comprehensive: echo 'ğŸ§ª Running comprehensive test suite...' && yarn test:unit:all && yarn test:integration:all && yarn test:e2e:all
scripts.test:unit:all: echo 'ğŸ“ Unit Tests (Vitest + Cypress)' && vitest run tests/unit && cypress run --component --spec 'cypress/unit/**/*.cy.ts'
scripts.test:integration:all: echo 'ğŸ”— Integration Tests (Vitest + Cypress)' && vitest run tests/integration && cypress run --spec 'cypress/integration/**/*.cy.ts'
scripts.test:theme:focus: echo 'ğŸ¨ CDD Theme Tests Only' && vitest run tests/unit/stores/theme && vitest run tests/unit/types/core/themeTypes.test.ts && vitest run tests/unit/config/theme-persistence.test.ts && cypress run --spec 'cypress/**/*theme*.cy.ts'
scripts.test:router:focus: echo 'ğŸ›£ï¸ Router Tests Only' && vitest run tests/unit/router && vitest run tests/integration/router && cypress run --spec 'cypress/**/*router*.cy.ts'
scripts.test:with-server: concurrently --kill-others --success first "yarn dev" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && yarn test:all"
scripts.analyze:duplicates: echo 'Code duplication analysis - install jscpd for full analysis'
scripts.analyze:complexity: eslint src/ --format json | grep -o '"ruleId":"complexity"' | wc -l || echo '0'
scripts.analyze:magic-numbers: grep -r '\b[0-9]\{2,\}\b' src/ --exclude-dir=config || echo 'No magic numbers found'
scripts.docs:validate: echo 'Documentation validation - checking for missing JSDoc'
scripts.quality:check: yarn lint:check && yarn type-check && yarn lint:structured-logs && yarn docs:check
scripts.quality:full: yarn quality:check && yarn analyze:duplicates && yarn analyze:complexity
